ygData.msgSnippet: OOC:( Who the heck put me in charge.  If that s what you guys want it, Spears can be in charge until Ramulus get s back.) ... Having never seen these two

OOC:( Who the heck put me in charge.  If that's what you guys want 
it, Spears can be in charge until Ramulus get's back.)

::Spears::

Having never seen these two before, she put her hand up and looked 
sternly at Bronco and Fliq. "Before you two go any further, Identify 
yourselves before I have you two blown to the matrix." she said in a 
calm and soft voice."Now, who are you? What are you doing here and 
how did you know we needed parts like that? And most of all, How did 
you know my name? Who are you?" Now her voice had a hint of 
excitement and curiosity. 

(Spears never made it to the pod with Ramulus. She had to go back to 
the ark with Striker)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Vulois pondered this. Could this bot help? Yes, he probably could, 
> but he needed to make some changes to his plan.
> 
> "Bring your men. They will be known as The Guardians of the 
Embassy. 
> They will protect it at all costs. But they musn't attack! For 
> Zardus, after a few days of training, we will go together to face 
> him."
> 
> Vulois welcomes Windrazor to his group.
> 
> (OOC: I know this might screw up everything we're doing, but isn't 
it 
> against the rules to have a char who controls other bots that 
aren't 
> other chars, sorta like the whole Beast Machine Drone thing? It's 
on 
> the rules page somewhere.)
> 
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> 
> (Spears seems the one who orchastrated this whole reapir thing, so 
I assumed that she could make decisions.)
> 
> Bronco and Fliq ran out of the Ark and found spears watching some 
> newcomer. They didn't bother with introductions, they would come 
> later. They ran right to Spears.
> 
> Fliq: Spears! I've developped away for us to collect as much needed 
> parts as possible. We can alter a pod and take it to the moon to 
> collect wreckage from the ship we crashed on. It could make it 
> completly re-built, except for the flying part. All we need is your 
> go ahead, and we're set! What do you say?
